topics.title: Loops: for, while, do-while
topics.english: Loops execute a block of code repeatedly while a condition is true.

components.name: for loop
components.english: Loop with initialization, condition, and increment
components.hinglish: Initialization, condition, aur increment ke saath loop

components.name: while loop
components.english: Loop that repeats while condition is true
components.hinglish: Loop jo repeat karta hai jab tak condition true hai

components.use_case: User input, reading files, unknown iterations

components.name: do-while loop

components.name: Nested loops

components.name: break
components.english: Terminates the loop or switch statement

components.name: continue
components.english: Skips current iteration and continues with next
components.hinglish: Current iteration skip karta hai aur agle iteration se continue karta hai

components.name: goto
components.hinglish: Labeled statement par jump karta hai
components.tip: Use only for error handling or breaking nested loops
components.cons: Makes code hard to read and debug
